creditline: Gift of Leo and Doris Hodroff
description: central lobed medallion with two Asian figures at R, engaged in intercourse, with woman seated on a table and man standing; attendant at L; foliate rim within lozenge and Y-patterned border; reverse molded with shaped panels and scrolls; Buddhist symbols and flowers around interior and exterior rims; blue and white
markings: on bottom: four various sticker\'s; on bottom, in blue: untranslated 6-character inscription
title: Plate from the "Erotic" series
